summary: Successfully verified all regression fixes for Multi-Agent Context Compression Engine MVP. Events endpoint now returns proper JSON (100% backend success), frontend manual workflow fully functional without error overlays, and demo workflow continues to work perfectly.

working_endpoints: POST /api/runs - creates run with run_id + config
GET /api/runs/{run_id}/events - NOW WORKING: returns JSON-serializable events (no ObjectId)

working_features: Page loads correctly with proper title and layout
All UI components render (setup card, events card, memory card)
Manual workflow: create run + send step works without error overlay
Events timeline updates properly after API calls
Demo run workflow works end-to-end with 13 events generated

passed_tests: Backend: All 11 API endpoints (100% success rate)
Backend: Events endpoint JSON serialization (no ObjectId issues)
Backend: Run creation, step processing, memory retrieval
Backend: Force compression and demo execution
Frontend: Manual workflow - create run + send step (no error overlay)
Frontend: Events timeline loading and display (2-4 events per run)
Frontend: Demo workflow (13 events, proper metrics)
Integration: Events API → Frontend event cards display
Integration: Memory API → Frontend memory viewer
Integration: Step API → Frontend metrics updates
